description: Creates recommendations about where to migrate your data to in Amazon Web Services. Recommendations are generated based on information that DataSync Discovery collects about your on-premises storage system's resources. For more information, see Recommendations provided by DataSync Discovery. Once generated, you can view your recommendations by using the DescribeStorageSystemResources operation.

parameters.name: DiscoveryJobArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the discovery job that collects information about your on-premises storage system.

parameters.name: ResourceIds
parameters.description: Specifies the universally unique identifiers (UUIDs) of the resources in your storage system that you want recommendations on. (string) ---

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of resource in your storage system that you want recommendations on.
